Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Prevent banner from being removed by minifiers" (#1851) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
Trying to debug a webpack bundle splitting setup was made a bit trickier because it was hard to tell where this package was being included. Adding this should make the process a bit simpler.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "nginx docs config doesn't work" (#1986) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://router.vuejs.org/zh-cn/essentials/history-mode.html](https://router.vuejs.org/zh-cn/essentials/history-mode.html)

### Steps to reproduce
vue-router 设置为mode: 'history'，nginx配置根据官网的设置：
```
location / {
  try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html;
}
```
报错如下：
```
Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token <
vendor.bb79a4c4fbca2d59f921.js:1 Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token <
app.51feaf429d12ada477d3.js:1 Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token <
```
网上搜遇到同样问题的原因是：因为配置服务器的时候把js资源重定向到了index.html，但是没有解决方法。谢谢~

### What is expected?
能正常访问

### What is actually happening?
无法访问

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->
